products.description: If your home is in need of some vibrant colour then this ray of sunshine is ideal. products.title: Energetic Yellow PerfectFIT Venetian Blind

products.description: If your conservatory has a luxurious feel then this really is the blind for you; bringing lavish golden colour as well as metallic sheen, this blind will complete a decadent look with ease.

products.title: Infusion asc Muted Gold Perfect Fit
products.description: Infusion asc muted gold perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

products.title: Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Infusion ASC Muted Gold
products.description: Infusion asc perfect fit pleated blinds are manufactured from high quality uk made fabrics. The advanced solar coating on the reverse of the fabric significantly reduces heat and glare entering your room, making them ideal for south facing windows and conservatories. Perfect fit pleated blind infusion asc muted gold available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Vassal Gold Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Paper your windows in gold for a touch of midas luxe. The vassal gold pleated perfect fit is a stunning gold-tone fabric made up of delicate checkers, that fold in pleats to add interest down the fabric. This gentle texture is enhanced by the dimout style, which allows for gentle light filtering during the daytime, to bathe the whole room in a sun-enhancing golden glow. Like all blinds in the perfect fit system, the shade clips in direct to your window for a tools-free, fuss-free fitting.
